q_en: I have completed all the workload for the sewing task with ID 34. Please update the completed quantity.
hint: To avoid the simultaneous occurrence of update and select in the same SQL statement, a step-by-step query can be used to organize the select query results into a fixed update statement

steps.sql: UPDATE products SET attributes = 'Brown' WHERE id IN (SELECT product_id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = (SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'PolyU_Skirt'))) AND attributes = 'Brown';
steps.description: To update the products with attributes 'Brown' that are associated with the working group named 'PolyU_Skirt', we need to set the attributes to 'Brown' for the specified products.
